      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Chair o)
        Description copied from class: Chair
        compareTo method this method compares the current object with passed object. If price of current chair less than price of passed object return -1. If price of current chair greater than price of passed object return 1. If price of current chair equals price of passed object then the number of wheels of the object compared. If number of wheels of current object less than number of wheels of passed object return -1. If number of wheels of current object greater than number of wheels of passed object return 1. If number of wheels of current object equals number of wheels of passed object return 0.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Chair>
        Overrides:
        compareTo in class Chair
        Parameters:
        o - Object of type Chair, to be compared with this Chair object
        Returns:
        -1 if this comes before other , 0 if they are equal or 1 otherwise
